verses.verse: ( Anouba swarga amadi anouba malem) ( Isa 65:17; 66:22; 2 Pet 3:13) Adudagi eina anouba swarga anouba malem ama ure. Ahanbagi swarga amadi malem adu mangkhre aduga samudra amuk leitre.

( Isa 52:1; Phong 3:12; Isa 61:10) Aduga Asengba Sahar, anouba Jerusalem aduna mahakki mapuroibagidamak ningthina set chaduna thourang tourabi keinya amagum Tengban Mapugi swargadagi kumtharakpa eina ure.

( Eze 37:27; Levi 26: ) Amasung phambal adudagi ahouba khonjel amana asumna hairakpa eina tare, “Yeng-u! Tengban Mapugi leipham adu houjikti misinggi marakta leirare, aduga Ibungo mahakna makhoiga leiminnagani. Makhoi Ibungo magi mising oigani, aduga Tengban Mapu masamakna makhoiga leiminnagani aduga mahak makhoigi Tengban Mapu oigani.
( Isa 25:8; 35:10; 65:19) Ibungo mahakna makhoigi mittagi pirang pumba teithokpigani. Amuk hanna siba, awaba, kappa amadi naba leiraroi, maramdi ariba potsing lanthokkhre.”

Adudagi phambal aduda phamliba Ibungona haikhi, “Aduga houjik eina pot pumnamak inou nouna semle!” Aduga mahakna asimasu eingonda hairak-i, “Masi isillu, maramdi masigi waheising asi achumbani amadi thajaba yabani.”

( Isa 55:1) Aduga mahakna eingonda hairak-i, “Pumnamak loire! Eidi Alpha amasung Omega, ahouba amasung aroiba aduni. Eina khouranglaba mahak aduda hingbagi ising iphut adudagi ising eina lemna pigani.
( 2 Samu 7:14; Isei 89:2627) Langamlaba makhoising aduna masi eingondagi phangjagani: Eina makhoigi Tengban Mapu oigani aduga makhoina eigi ichasing oigani.

Adubu pangdabasing, thajadabasing, tukkachaningai oibasing, mihatpasing, nupa nupi lannabasing, hidam yaidambagi thabak toubasing, lai murti latpasing amasung chinthiba pumnamakki panthungdi achakpa kantrukki meigi pat aduda oigani. Masi anisuba siba aduni.”

( Anouba Jerusalem) Aduga akonbagi awa ana taretna thanba tenggot taret paiba swargadut taret adugi maraktagi amana inakta laktuna hairak-i, “Lak-u, Yaomacha adugi nupi, keinya adu ei nangonda uhange.”

( Eze 40:2) Thawai aduna eibu khudum challaduna, swargadut aduna yamna wangkhraba chingjao amagi matonda eibu pukhatle. Aduga Tengban Mapugi swargadagi kumtharakpa, Asengba Sahar Jerusalem-bu mahakna eingonda uhalle.
Madu Tengban Mapugi matik mangalna ngallammi. Sahar adu mamal yamba nung, liklaigumna senglaba jasper nungum ngallammi.

( Eze 48:30-35) Sahar adugi achouba, awangba chekpal amadi changpham thongjao taranithoi leirammi, aduga panthongsing adubu pannaba swargadut taranithoisu leirammi. Aduga panthongsing aduda Israel machasinggi salai taranithoigi mingsing irammi.
Maikei khudingda panthong ahum ahum: nongpokta ahum, khada ahum, awangda ahum amadi nongchupta ahum leirammi.
Aduga sahargi chekpal adugi yumpham taranithoi leirammi, amasung maduda Yaomacha adugi pakhonchatpa taranithoigi maming leirammi.
( Eze 40:3) Sahar adu amadi madugi panthong amasung chekpal adu onnaba sanagi lam-on chei ama eingonda wa ngangkhiba swargadut aduda leirammi.

Sahar adu marak mayung animakta mapungphana chithek nairammi. Swargadut aduna mahakki lam-on chei aduna onthokle: Madu kilometre 2400 sang-i aduga marak mayung amasung awangba adu chap mannana sang-i.
Swargadut aduna chekpal adubusu mioibagi lam onbagi chang sijinnaduna ollammi, aduga madu metre humphu tharammi.
( Isa 54: ) Chekpal adu Jasper nungna sabani, aduga sahar adumakna mingselgumna senglaba asengba sanana sabani.
Sahargi chekpalgi yumpham adu mamal tanglaba makhal pumnamakki nungna leitenglammi. Ahanbagi yumbi makhong adu jasper nungni, anisuba aduna sapphire, ahumsuba aduna agate, marisuba aduna emerald,

mangasuba aduna onyx, taruksuba aduna carnelian, taretsuba aduna hangammapal machugi quartz, nipalsuba aduna beryl, mapalsuba aduna topaz, tarasuba aduna chalcedony, taramathoisuba aduna turquoise, aduga taranithoisuba aduna amethyst-ni.
Panthong taranithoi aduna mani mukta taranithoi oirammi, panthong khudingmak mani mukta amamamna sembani. Sahar adugi lambi adu likligumna manung phaona uba asengba sanana oirammi.
Sahar aduda eina Mapugi sanglen uba phanglamde, maramdi sahar adugi Mapugi sanglen adu ingam ngamba Ibungo Tengban Mapu amadi Yaomacha aduna oirammi.
( Isa 60: ) Sahar aduda ngannanabagidamak numitsu thasu mathou taramde, maramdi Tengban Mapugi matik mangalna maduda ngallammi, aduga Yaomacha aduna madugi thaomei oirammi.
( Isa 60:3) Aduga kanbiba phangkhraba phurupsing aduna madugi mangalgi mapalna chatkani, aduga malemgi ningthousingna makhoigi matik mangal amadi ikaikhumnaba maduda purakkani.
( Isa 60:11) Sahar adugi panthongsing adu numit chuppa hanggani, madu keidounungda thingloi, maramdi maduda ahing leiraroi.
Aduga phurupsinggi matik mangal amadi ikaikhumnaba adu maduda purakkani.

( Isa 52:1; Eze 44:9) Adubu sengdaba amata sahar aduda changloi, aduga ikainingai oiba thabak touba nattraga minamba ngangba kana amata maduda changloi, adubu Yaomacha adugi hingbagi lairikta maming isinkhraba makhoina sahar aduda changgani.
